card.name: Serena, Last of Goldnight
card.text: Each card you own that is not on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to the card's mana cost. When a creature leaves the battlefield, you may discard a card.

card.name: Castelia, the Resolute
card.text: {3}{W/U/R}{W/U/R}: Create a 4/4 red, white, and blue Human Knight creature token with haste named “Castelia's Charge”. Sacrifice it at end of turn.

card.name: Castelia's Charge
card.text: Haste

card.name: Alida, Fleeting Spirit
card.text: Creatures you control have skulk. {1}{W/B}, {T}: Target creature is a Spirit in addition to its other creature types until end of turn.

card.name: Abigail, Exiled Inventor
card.text: Token artifact creatures you control have Modular 1 (This enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.) {U}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact creature you control: Abigail, Exiled Inventor deals damage to target creature equal to the sacrificed creatures power.

card.name: Thordaw, Werewolf Alpha
card.text: {3}, {T}: Transform target creature. Whenever a Werewolf you control enters the battlefield, untap Thordaw, Werewolf Alpha.

card.name: Haniel, Unrelenting Rider
card.text: Nontoken creatures you control have extort.

card.name: Gurbal, Grand Culinary Master
card.text: {2}{G}{G}, Sacrifice a Plant: You gain life equal to the sacrificed Plant's converted mana cost, then draw a card. {1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice a Beast: Gurbal, Grand Culinary Master deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Shideh-Merle, Aurashaper
card.text: Auras you control have "{G/W/U}, Pay 2 life: Attach this Aura to target permanent or player it can enchant."

card.name: Accenu, Ancestral Animist
card.text: Whenever an Equipment you control would become attached to a creature, you may create a 0/1 white Spirit creature token and attach that Equipment to it instead. Whenever a Spirit creature you control would be destroyed, if it is equipped, you may sacrifice an Equipment attached to it instead.

card.name: Spirit
card.text: Flying

card.name: Falenari, Grand Gardener
card.text: {G}{G}, Sacrifice a Plant you control: Add an amount of {G} to your mana pool equal to the toughness of the sacrificed creature.

card.name: Xoldevak, Rotting Incarnate
card.text: If you would put a -1/-1 counter on a creature, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature instead. If you would put a +1/+1 counter on a creature, you maybe pay {1}. If you do, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature instead.

card.name: Kalaron, Guild Leader
card.text: {R}, {T}: Target creature must attack this turn if able. {W}, {T}: Target creature can't attack this turn.

card.name: Miria, the Living Woods
card.text: {R}{G}, {T}: Put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It is still a land.

card.name: Castelia, Shield of Avemarc
card.text: {R}{G}{W}, {T}: Create a copy of target token creature you control. You gain X life, where X is equal to the number of tokens you control that share a creature type with it.

card.name: Menorath, Stronghold Veteran
card.text: Blocking creatures you control have +0/+2. Creatures you control with defender lose defender. {2}{W/R}: Target creature you control gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Advorian, Warmonger
card.text: Creatures you control have haste. If a creature a player controls attacks, all creatures that player controls attack if able.

card.name: Dominaria Awoken
card.text: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life. {1}{R}, {T}: Dominaria Awoken deals 1 damage to target creature.

card.name: Wenela, Ecotitan
card.text: Creatures you control without evolve gain evolve. {G}{U}: Create a 1/1 green and blue Horror creature token.

card.name: Jimilix, Paradox Magus
card.text: At the beginning of your first upkeep each turn, you get an additional upkeep step after this step.

card.name: Memere, Turner of Essence
card.text: Whenever you return a creature to its owners hand, instants and sorceries cost {1} less until end of turn. {1}{U}{R}, {T}: Return target creature to its owners hand.

card.name: Guardian of Llanowar
card.text: Landfall — If a land entered the battlefield under your control this turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and trample.

card.name: Kamirth, Dragon of Leylines
card.text: Creatures you control have Amplify 1.

card.name: Borgue, Artificer Savant
card.text: {1}{U}{U}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact creature, {T}: Search your library for a noncreature artifact, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Shirdar, Dread Doctor
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, put a hex counter on Shirdar, Dread Doctor. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Shirdar has six or more hex counters on it, return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bao Xue, Merchant of Secrets
card.text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to an opponent, its controller draws that many cards. No more than two creatures may attack each combat.

card.name: Ali and Rosa, the Flames of Passion
card.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, the first creature you cast on your second main phase cost {1} less. {2}{W/R}, {T}: Target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Ji-Min, Sunblessed of Raju
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, you may put and exaltation counter on target nonland permanent. Permanents you control with exaltation counters have exalted.

card.name: Luru, Priestess of Sanguinus
card.text: Demons you control cannot be countered or returned to its owner's hand. Humans you control have "Put a -1/-1 counter on this creature, {T}: Add one of any color of mana to your mana pool. This mana can only be used to cast Demon spells."

card.name: Padma, Overseer of the Foundry
card.text: Creatures you control are artifacts in addition to their other types. {X}{X}{W}{U}{B}, {T}: Gain control of target creature or artifact with a converted mana cost of X.

card.name: Vida, the Necrotic Flame
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay {4}. If you do, create a token that is a copy of it. It is a Zombie in addition to its other types.

card.name: Serena, Goldnight Angel
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 3 life. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Malum, the Usurper Queen
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks the monarch that isn't you, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {3}{R/G/W}, {T}: Target player becomes the monarch. Only play this ability is you are the monarch.

card.name: Narameya, the Flow of Elements
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature for its evoke cost, if you would sacrifice it when it comes into play you may instead sacrifice it at end of turn. It gains haste.

card.name: Alycia, Archmage of Goldnight
card.text: Whenever a creature would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. {R/W}, {T}: Target Human gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Johanna, Archmage of Moonsilver
card.text: {T}: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard, then you may discard a card. If you do, return a Human or Angel card from your graveyard to your hand. Delirium — {1}{W}{W}, Exile four cards with different types from your graveyard: Destroy all creatures. Activate this ability only if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard and only when you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Laurela, Archmage of Alabaster
card.text: You may cast Aura spells from your graveyard. {T}: Exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. Put X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is equal to the numbr of creatures exiled by this effect.

card.name: Laurycia, Archmage of Nightmares
card.text: Costs of Eldrazi spells and permaments can be paid using mana of any color. Whenever you cast a non-Eldrazi creature, you may pay {2}. If you do, scry 1 then look at the top card of your library. If it is an Eldrazi spell, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

card.name: Viktoria, Archmage of Herons
card.text: {T}: Humans you control gain "{W}: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn" until end of turn. As long as you control a Human and Viktoria, Archmage of Herons is untapped, you have hexproof.

card.name: Palsoria, the Unforgiving
card.text: Whenever one or more sources deal damage to you or a creature you control, Palsoria, the Unforgiving deals 1 damage to that source's controller.

card.name: Erimmont, Woodsin Stalker
card.text: Creatures you control have evolve. At the beginning of each end step, sacrifice all creatures you control with power 6 or greater, then create two 3/3 green Beast creature tokens for each creature sacrificed this way.

card.name: Ali, Freethinker
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain X life, where X is equal to the number of colors that creature was. Associate

card.name: Rosa, Oathsworn
card.text: Whenever a player draws a card, that player may reveal that card. If they do not, Rosa, Oathsworn deals 1 damage to that player. Associate

card.name: Vyk, Thunder-Thrash Elder
card.text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Viashino creature token. {2}{B}{G}: Viashino creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Bius, the World Anchor
card.text: Whenever a creature would enter the battlefield with no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead. {1}, Remove any number of +1/+1 counters from creatures you control, {T}: Bius, the World Anchor deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed to target creature or player.

card.name: Kaz, the Sunderer
card.text: At the beginning of the first upkeep, create a colorless artifact Equipment token named Sunder. It has Equip 3 and “Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to target creature."

card.name: Sunder
card.text: Equip {3} Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to target creature.

card.name: Iori, She who Guides the Kami
card.text: Instants and sorceries you cast are Arcane in addition to their other types. Whenever you Splice onto a spell, you may draw a card and then discard a card. {W/U}, {T}: You may cast a target Spirit creature card from your graveyard until end of turn.

card.name: Palude, Saint of the Mire
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, you may tap Palude, Saint of the Mire and lose 2 life. If you do, search you library for a Swamp, put it onto the battlefield tapped, shuffle your library, and then you gain an experience counter. {4}{B}, {T}: Create X 2/2 black Zombie tokens, where X is half the number of experience counters you have, rounded up.
